sentence: Same with Arizona’s Sen. Mark Kelly and Montana’s Sen. Jon Tester.
author: Ann Coulter
title: Ann Coulter: Pro-Crime Party Nominates a Justice

sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly said Monday he will vote to confirm Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the U.S. Supreme Court when her nomination appears before the evenly-divided Senate, expected later this week.
author: Yvonne Wingett Sanchez
title: Why Sen. Mark Kelly will vote to confirm Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court
Ketanji Brown Jackson Will Be A Liability for Senate Democrats
